text: The Wey VV5 is a luxury Crossover SUV made by Wey a luxury brand of Great Wall Motors (GWM) from 2017 to 2021. == History and Features == The Wey VV5 was launched in 2017 during the development. It was known as the 02. The car shares its plataform with the Wey VV7 and The Haval H6. It has a 1.5 liter and 2.0 liter both turbo gasoline engines and a 7-speed DCT transmission. == Markets == The Wey VV5 was sold mainly in China during its production. == Discontinuation == The production of The Wey VV5 ended in 2021 and was replaced by the Wey Latte and the Wey Macchiato. == References == Category:Chinese automobiles Category:2010s automobiles Category:2020s automobiles Category:Sport utility vehicles
title: Wey VV5
